Good Comments: No matter how bad gg is, Furukawa managed to be even worse. Almost didn't watch it further after the failure that were the first two lines, but then still decided to give it a chance. I shouldn't have.
Even worse than gg... They really need to actually QC and fix the errors they find.  Translation may have been better but this is localised too so who cares. Go for gg or wait for a decent group :|
without gg's subs this show loses all humor.
Bad Comments: gg doesn't include "^_^" in their subs, so go for gg. And I laughed a little at how Furukawa handled the first two lines.
